about_the_game:
The story begins with a massive fire that destroyed an ongoing ritual,
causing ghosts and ghouls to run rampant in both the celestial and mortal realms.

To restart the ritual, the protagonist "Hong-Niang" must assist her parents in purchasing the ingredients required for the ceremony in town.
And with the assistance of two mythical creatures, "Taotie" and "Fu-Xi," complete the mission;
thwart the mischief-makers disrupting the ceremony, restoring order to both the celestial and mortal realms.

Features



  • Chinese-style art and architectural scenes.
Whether it's the magnificent Jiu Ge Restaurant or the uniquely themed town, every map is worth exploring and savoring.


  • Shadow puppetry stories and real recipes.
Legendary stories presented through paper-cut shadow puppetry and actual mooncake recipes used in the game provide you with a deeper sense of immersion and surprises!


  • Two battle modes and four difficulty levels to choose from.
Different choices will affect the gameplay; we offer three difficulty levels and a non-combat version for you to choose freely.

  • Parodying mythical stories.
A funny and entertaining plot that breaks the established impression of mythical stories! Suitable for players who enjoy lighthearted and cheerful narratives.

short_description: "Legends" is an adventure puzzle game that parodies Chinese mythology. You will play as the protagonist "Hong-Niang," who goes to the town to buy ingredients for her parents and stop the bad guys from disrupting the ceremony.
